alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 26 at 7:18PM PDT until April 27 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Southwest California coastal areas from San Luis Obispo County through Los Angeles County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coastal areas that are still clear this evening, including the Malibu Coast and the southwest coast of Santa Barbara County, are expected to see increasing fog and reduced visibilities by later tonight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
